entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:32 PM EDT Friday 5 May 2023
